name: Oil Barrens
description:
Conceit

Trudge through a procedurally-generated desert collecting oil. At the end of every turn you may need to play minigames based on what happened (dodge an enemy, jump over a minecart, collect water from a cactus). The more complicated the state is the more minigames you'll need to play.

Controls
  • WADX / numpad 8462 -> move
  • QEZC / numpad 7913-> move diagonally
  • Space -> submit / toggle selection / jump
  • R -> reload
  • Esc -> exit selection
Credits & Attribution
  • Most models made by Alex Hanson-White in Crocotile 3d
  • 2d Sprites from Kenney.nl 1-bit pack
  • SFX by Kenney.nl
  • Sky background by Screaming Brain Studios
  • HelvetiPixel font by pentacom
  • Beurk font by Beeline
  • Solstice of Suffering font by GraveTech
